dialogue.speaker: Protagonist
dialogue.text: Welcome to the land of Eldoria, a mystical realm of wonder and danger.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: Your journey begins in the quaint village of Willowdale, where rumors have been circulating about strange occurrences in the nearby forest.

dialogue.speaker: Villager 1
dialogue.text: Pardon me, traveler. Have you heard about the recent happenings in the forest? People say they've seen shadowy figures lurking in the trees.
